mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Pennhurst Study Brief Report #10: Survey of Families of Clients Deinstitutionalized from the Date of the Court Order to April 30, 1980

mods:name.mods:namePart: Detre Library & Archives, Heinz History Center

mods:mods.mods:abstract: A copy of report #10 on a study done by the Temple University Developmental Disabilities Center following the deinstitutionalization of Pennhurst State School. This report evaluates the feelings of the families of deinstitutionalized former residents of Pennhurst State School.

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records

mods:relatedItem.mods:note: II. State School and Hospital (SSH) and Interim Care Committee Records 1972-1997
Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records, 1953-2000, MSS 1002 , Detre Library and Archives, Senator John Heinz History Center
